Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 25.0.3-1, affected by CVE-2022-21698
